attributes.action: Against The Unjustified Rise of probate fees
attributes.additional_details:
The rise probate fees cannot be justified as it is the same workload to administer probate for an estates valued Between at £ 50.000 to £2m
the bulk of this work administering probate is carried out by civil servants who earn about £10.00 an hour so a fair rate for the service supplied .On the proposed rise in fees this is a tax on your wealth that you have accumulated and not a fee for a service so you are  discriminated against for working hard and saving
attributes.background:
This is a service that is supplied by ccj there really is no reason that you should have to claim probate if you have a will or if your partner outlives
you they can organise your wishes at no cost at all
